Frontend.name: RiwiJobs
Frontend.description: Development of a web application called 'Riwi Jobs' using JSON Server as a fake backend and Vanilla JavaScript for the frontend. The application has four main views: a public one to list job positions, one for login, one for company registration, and another for vacancy management per company.
